pages.title: Incubator
pages.text: The <item>incubator/$ has two purposes. It can create <item>genetic plasmids/$, which are used with the <item>$(l:essentials:witchcraft/syringe#potions)syringe/$, and it can create <item>spawn eggs/$ from <item>$(l:essentials:witchcraft/cloning#process)embryos/$, making it the final stage of the <thing>$(l:essentials:witchcraft/cloning)cloning process/$.$(br2)To create <item>genetic plasmids/$, it uses 1 <item>mutagen/$ and 1 (vanilla chicken)

egg. <item>Genetic plasmids/$ will spoil after 30 minutes.$(br2)To create <item>spawn eggs/$, it uses 1 (<thing>$(l:essentials:witchcraft/spoilage)non-spoiled/$) <item>$(l:essentials:witchcraft/cloning#process)embryo/$ and 1 (vanilla chicken) egg.$(br2)The process can take anywhere from 1 minutes to 20 minutes- and 20 minutes might be enough time to <thing>$(l:essentials:witchcraft/spoilage)spoil/$ the <item>$(l:essentials:witchcraft/cloning#process)embryo/$. The rate it works at is based on the <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/heat)temperature

<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/heat)/$. It connects to <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/heat)heat cables/$ on any side.$(br2)The <item>incubator/$ doesn't use heat, but should be kept within 10°C of the target <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/heat)temperature/$. While within 10°C of the target <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/heat)temperature/$, it takes 1 minute. While outside that range, it works at a twentieth the speed. The target <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/heat)temperature/$ is randomized every time the <item>incubator/$ finishes a crafting
operation, but will always be within 35-140°C.$(br2)<thing>$(l:essentials/circuits)Circuits/$ read the current target <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/heat)temperature/$, in degrees C.$(br2)
